properties.areaDesc: Greene, GA; Oconee, GA; Clarke, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 10:13AM EST until February 14 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Oconee River near Penfield affecting Clarke...Greene and Oconee
Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

Oconee River near Dublin affecting Johnson...Laurens...Washington
and Wilkinson Counties

Oconee River near Mount Vernon affecting Montgomery...Treutlen and
Wheeler Counties

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until Friday morning...The Flood Warning continues for The Oconee River near Penfield. * From tomorrow early afternoon until Friday morning. * At 10 AM Tuesday the stage was 10.5 feet...and rising. * Minor flooding is forecast. * Flood stage is 13 feet. * Forecast to rise above flood stage by Wednesday early afternoon and continue to rise to near 14.8 feet by Thursday early afternoon. The river will fall below flood stage by Friday morning. * At 15 feet...Minor flooding continues to expand into fields... woodlands and pastures...mainly on the right bank of the river
